revised_title: The Minimum-Point of Change of Potential in a Voltaic Couple
tldr: The author investigates the minimum-point of change of potential in a voltaic couple using a new method that does not require a thermo-electric pile. The study examines the effects of various substances on the electromotive force of the couple and demonstrates the delicacy and sensitivity of the method. The results can be used as tests for the purity and uniformity of dissolved substances.
